exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ChatViewSkin" width="400" height="600" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<ns1:UiWindow width="100%" height="100%" x="3" y="0"/>
	<e:TextInput id="textInput" width="247" height="50" x="23" y="533" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" textColor="0xffffff"/>
	<e:Button id="sendBtn" label="发送" x="280" y="533"/>
	<e:Label text="测试" x="159" y="7" anchorOffsetX="0" width="102" textAlign="center" size="22"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="UiWindowSkin" width="400" height="213" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="158d74197f2" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image id="backImg" width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" source="role_10" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scale9Grid="29,51,312,25"/>
	<e:Button id="closeBtn" label="按钮" y="1" width="38" height="38" right="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="role_14" source.down="role_14" source.disabled="role_14" x.down="1" y.down="1"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="CreateRoleViewSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="158d7eae2cf" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="1" source="cjsc_01_jpg"/>
	<e:Image width="282" height="89" x="99" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="cjsc_15_png"/>
	<e:Image width="400" height="112" y="95" source="wing_08" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" x="40"/>
	<e:Image width="400" height="112" y="215" source="wing_08" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" x="40"/>
	<e:Image width="400" height="112" y="337" source="wing_08" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" x="40"/>
	<e:Image width="39" height="85" y="106.5" source="cjsc_09" x="220.5"/>
	<e:Image width="39" height="85" y="346.5" x="220.5" source="cjsc_11"/>
	<e:Image width="39" height="85" y="228.5" x="220.5" source="cjsc_10"/>
	<e:ToggleButton id="tab1" label="切换按钮" x="87" y="102" width="100" height="100">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled,disabledAndSelected">
			<e:Image width="100" height="100" source="cjsc_05" source.down="cjsc_05" source.disabledAndSelected="cjsc_05"/>
	<e:Image width="82" height="82" source="head_10" x="9" y="11"/>
	<e:Image width="100" height="100" x="0" y="0" includeIn="down,disabledAndSelected" source="cjsc_12"/>
	<e:Image width="100" height="100" x="0" y="0" includeIn="down" source="cjsc_12"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="tab2" label="切换按钮" x="295" y="102" width="100" height="100">
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled,disabledAndSelected">
		<e:Image width="100" height="100" source="cjsc_05" source.down="cjsc_05" source.disabledAndSelected="cjsc_05"/>
		<e:Image width="82" height="82" x="9" y="11" source="head_11"/>
		<e:Image width="100" height="100" x="0" y="0" includeIn="down,disabledAndSelected" source="cjsc_12"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="tab6" label="切换按钮" x="295" y="340" width="100" height="100">
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled,disabledAndSelected">
		<e:Image width="100" height="100" source="cjsc_05" source.down="cjsc_05" source.disabledAndSelected="cjsc_05"/>
		<e:Image width="82" height="82" x="9" y="11" source="head_31"/>
		<e:Image width="100" height="100" x="0" y="0" includeIn="down,disabledAndSelected" source="cjsc_12"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="tab3" label="切换按钮" x="87" y="223" width="100" height="100">
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled,disabledAndSelected">
		<e:Image width="100" height="100" source="cjsc_05" source.down="cjsc_05" source.disabledAndSelected="cjsc_05"/>
		<e:Image width="82" height="82" x="9" y="11" source="head_20"/>
		<e:Image width="100" height="100" x="0" y="0" includeIn="down,disabledAndSelected" source="cjsc_12"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="tab4" label="切换按钮" x="295" y="223" width="100" height="100">
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled,disabledAndSelected">
		<e:Image width="100" height="100" source="cjsc_05" source.down="cjsc_05" source.disabledAndSelected="cjsc_05"/>
		<e:Image width="82" height="82" x="9" y="11" source="head_21"/>
		<e:Image width="100" height="100" x="0" y="0" includeIn="down,disabledAndSelected" source="cjsc_12"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="tab5" label="切换按钮" x="87" y="341" width="100" height="100">
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled,disabledAndSelected">
		<e:Image width="100" height="100" source="cjsc_05" source.down="cjsc_05" source.disabledAndSelected="cjsc_05"/>
		<e:Image width="82" height="82" x="9" y="11" source="head_30"/>
		<e:Image width="100" height="100" x="0" y="0" includeIn="down,disabledAndSelected" source="cjsc_12"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:Image id="jobImg" width="128" height="52" x="178" y="442" source="cjsc_06"/>
	<e:Label id="jobDesTxt" text="兼顾远程输出和辅助的职业" x="0" y="496" anchorOffsetX="0" width="480" anchorOffsetY="0" height="31" textAlign="center" size="20" displayAsPassword="false"/>
	<e:Button id="starBtn" label="按钮" x="129" y="592.5" height="71">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="cjjs_03" source.down="cjjs_03" width.down="90%" x.down="8" height.down="90%" y.down="3" width.up="100%" height.up="100%" x.up="0" y.up="1" fillMode.up="scale"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:TextInput id="nameTxt" width="285" height="47" x="95" y="541" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" textColor="0xfbf7f7"/>
	<e:Button id="randomBtn" label="按钮" x="385" y="543" width="45" currentState="up" height="47">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,disabled,down">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="cjsc_04" width.up="100%" height.up="100%" x="0" y="0" x.up="0" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" x.down="2" y.down="2" anchorOffsetX.down="0" anchorOffsetY.down="0" anchorOffsetX.up="0" anchorOffsetY.up="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MainViewSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="158dcec3670" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image width="215" height="37" x="76" y="48" source="zjm_06"/>
	<e:Image width="480" height="45" x="0" y="0" source="zjm_13"/>
	<e:Image width="101" height="162" x="-10" y="-2" source="zjm_01" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
	<e:Image id="headImg" width="75" height="75" x="5" y="41" source="uihead21_png"/>
	<e:Button id="vipBtn" label="按钮" x="96" y="89">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="zjm_03" source.down="zjm_03" source.disabled="zjm_03" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" x.down="2" width.up="100%" height.up="100%" y.down="2"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="rankBtn" label="按钮" x="183" y="89">
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
		<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="zjm_03" source.down="zjm_03" source.disabled="zjm_03" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" x.down="2" y.down="2" width.up="100%" height.up="100%"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image width="42" height="21" x="107" y="98" source="zjm_04" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Image width="58" height="22" x="197" y="97" source="zjm_38" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Image width="73" height="38" x="94" y="46" source="zjm_05"/>
	<e:Label id="nameTxt" text="於起风" x="22" y="16" size="16" bold="true" anchorOffsetX="0" width="72" anchorOffsetY="0" height="22"/>
	<e:Label id="lvlTxt" text="5级" x="113" y="18" size="16" bold="true" anchorOffsetX="0" width="70" anchorOffsetY="0" height="21"/>
	<e:Image width="135" height="28" x="202" y="11" source="zjm_09" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
	<e:Image width="135" height="28" x="344" y="11" source="zjm_09" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
	<e:Image width="25" height="20" x="348" y="14" source="yuanbao" fillMode="scale"/>
	<e:Image width="25" height="20" x="206" y="16" fillMode="scale" source="jinbi"/>
	<e:Label id="yinbiTxt" text="0000000" x="251" y="17" size="16" textAlign="right" anchorOffsetX="0" width="58" anchorOffsetY="0" height="22"/>
	<e:Label id="yuanbaoTxt" text="0000000" x="388" y="18" size="16" textAlign="right" anchorOffsetX="0" width="58" anchorOffsetY="0" height="23"/>
	<e:Image width="480" height="130" x="0" y="667" source="zjm_15"/>
	<e:Button id="roleBtn" label="按钮" x="122" y="714">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="zjm_17" source.down="zjm_17" source.disabled="zjm_17" x.down="1" y.down="1"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="shopBtn" label="按钮" x="395" y="711">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="zjm_20" source.down="zjm_20" source.disabled="zjm_20" x.down="1" y.down="1"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="equipBtn" label="按钮" x="253" y="715">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="zjm_18" source.down="zjm_18" source.disabled="zjm_18" x.down="1" y.down="1"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="bagBtn" label="按钮" x="323" y="714">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="zjm_19" source.down="zjm_19" source.disabled="zjm_19" x.down="1" y.down="1"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="skillBtn" label="按钮" x="187" y="715">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="zjm_16" source.down="zjm_16" source.disabled="zjm_16" x.down="1" y.down="1"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="testBtn" label="测试" x="5" y="182" anchorOffsetX="0" width="69" anchorOffsetY="0" height="55"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="cjsc_14"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>
